Subjects: God, hymns to; hymns, to God; Creation
_description: An aureate macaronic song of praise to the Lord of Creation — nine 8-line stanzas

BodAsh189.First Lines:
Omnipotentem semper adorantOperacyons heuenly & yerthly
                    all…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…The societe of seyntes he to us sendeEt benedicunt omne
                        per euum

BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…The societe of seyntys he to vs sendeEt benedicunt omne
                        per euum
BLAdd60577.Note:
At end, ‘Pettantem danpnare caue nam labimur omnes / Aut sumus
                        aut fuimus aut possumus esse quod hic est’ (f. 64).
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
